title: Danton
occurrences: It's Danton
Danton is back
Danton!
The Republic will be spared much grief if we send Danton to the guillotine now
Danton is an idol
Danton is behind those attacks, Camille Desmoulins is in thrall to him
Desmoulins and Danton will be beheaded whatever you say
- I accuse Danton and his friends... - Forgive me, I'm a little late
I accuse Danton and his friends of counter-revolutionary activity
- Danton, a servant of the Revolution? - You're raving
You forget all that Danton has done in your eagerness to cut him down
Remember the Champ de Mars massacre? Danton instigated it
The letter found in Mirabeau's safe openly denounced Danton's plotting
In no case can I allow Danton to go on trial
You have evidence against Danton
Citzens, like all of you, I doubt Danton's good faith
Fabre, Danton and the rest are guilty of numerous crimes
But we won't touch Danton who bears the most blame
Executing Danton would only plunge the bourgeoisie into counter-revolution
The traitor, Danton, must be granted an exorbitant favour: amnesty
"Danton is after a dictatorship!" One single whisper, and you've had it
So much for your defenceless Danton
You'd lower yourself to ask Danton to receive you?
- Danton forced the issue - What?
Your friend Danton is using you
But in fact you're aiding subversion, which is precisely Danton's goal
Danton threw you out, so you come and crawl to me
Danton and Robespierre have been at odds all this time
In one hour, at 3:30 a.m. you'll send the police to arrest Danton
Danton and his accomplices too
Danton has the bankers' support, you yourself told us that
It will be the Committee's death and Danton's triumph
You're right, Danton has support everywhere
Who else besides Danton?
Very well, those three will be jailed with Danton
The Committee's just decided to arrest Danton and three accomplices
- Who? - Georges Danton
"...that Danton..."
